description: Performs automatic segmentation of intracranial region.

infile.title: Anat file
infile.description: Filename of anat dataset to be segmented

prefix.title: Prefix for output file
prefix.description: Prefix name for file to contain segmented image

min_val.title: Minimum voxel intensity
min_val.description: Minimum voxel intensity limit. Default is internal PDF estimate for lower bound

max_val.title: Maximum voxel intensity
max_val.description: Maximum voxel intensity limit. Default is internal PDF estimate for upper bound

min_conn.title: Minimum voxel connectivity
min_conn.description: Minimum voxel connectivity to enter. Default is 4

max_conn.title: Maximum voxel connectivity
max_conn.description: Maximum voxel connectivity to leave. Default is 2

no_smooth.title: No smoothing flag
no_smooth.description: Suppress spatial smoothing of segmentation mask

mask.title: Generate functional image mask
mask.description: Generate functional image mask (complement). Default is to generate anatomical image
